name: Baron Ricochet
description: Baron Ricochet is an exciting new game for your mobile device or PC that takes the classic "shoot your character at enemies" mechanic and puts a refreshing new twist on it! Featuring 39 obstacle and trap-filled levels across 4 unique worlds, 4 playable characters, and hours of replayability, Baron Ricochet is sure to keep you busy for a long time to come!
